edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.model.db
Class RuleDbAdapter

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.model.db.DbAdapter
      edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.model.db.RuleDbAdapter

public class RuleDbAdapter
extends DbAdapter

Database helper class for the Rules table. Defines basic CRUD methods.

This table contains all rule records defined by the user. Every rule is a combination of records in these four tables: Rules, RuleActions, RuleActionParameters, RuleFilters.

RuleName is the user defined name of the rule; RuleDesc is the user defined description of the rule; Enabled is whether this rule is activated. Created is the time stamp of when this rule is created Updated is the time stamp of when this rule is last updated

                   java.lang.String ruleName,
                   java.lang.String ruleDesc,

Insert a new Rule record.

Parameters:
eventID - is id of the event which this rule belongs to.
ruleName - is name of this rule
ruleDesc - is description of this rule
enabled - is whether this rule is active
Returns:
ruleID if success, or -1 if failed.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is null within parameters

fetchAll

public Cursor fetchAll(java.lang.Long eventID,
                       java.lang.String ruleName,
                       java.lang.String ruleDesc,
                       java.lang.Boolean enabled,
                       java.lang.String orderBy)
Return a Cursor that contains all Rule records which matches the parameters.

Parameters:
eventID - is the event id, or null to fetch any eventID
ruleName - is name of rule, or null to fetch any ruleName
ruleDesc - is description of rule, or null to fetch any description
enabled - is whether the rule is activated or null to fetch any enabled status
orderBy - is the ',' delimited order by columns, or null if no specific order
Returns:
a Cursor that contains all Rule records which matches the parameters.
Throws:
SQLiteException - if orderBy is not compiled correctly

update

public boolean update(java.lang.Long ruleID,
                      java.lang.Long eventID,
                      java.lang.String ruleName,
                      java.lang.String ruleDesc,
                      java.lang.Boolean enabled)
Update a rule record with specific parameters.

Parameters:
ruleID - is id of the record to be updated
eventID - is the event id, or null if not updating it
ruleName - is the name of the rule, or null if not updating it
ruleDesc - is the description of rule, or null if not updating it
enabled - is whether the rule is activated, or null if not updating it
Returns:
true if success, or false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ruleID is null
